reviewText: Just wish it was a full length feature! Thought this was hilarious and would definitely watch more. I loved the cinematography as well.

Lightning & Cragg is all that is good about short film making. Nothing wrong with block-busters, but to truly understand the art of film making, you need to view it in from the angle of where every major director and actor began. The low budget highly creative independent world of films. Bravo Michael Scott and crew. You have done it again!
It's absolutely, undoubtedly a motion picture! I watched it and the movement of the pixels of my monitor confirmed that I was not viewing a still image.
